import * as pkg from "./pkg";

export type TestBar = pkg.Bar;
export type TestBaz = pkg.Baz;

-- pkg.ts --
export * from "./bar";
export * from "./baz";

-- bar.ts --
export type Bar = {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  description: string;
};

-- baz.ts --
export type Baz = {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  description: string;
};
